com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.model

Class SteamAPICalls

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.model.SteamAPICalls

  • public class SteamAPICalls
extends java.lang.Object
    Class SteamAPICalls handles communication with SteamAPI (documentation: https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Steam_Web_API). API usage includes retrieving games used by players, friend list and friend information, achievements and user statistics. API JSON responses are mapped to objects.
    Author:
    jetrosa

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String API_KEY
      API key used for Steam api usage authorisation.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,GameData> fGamesMappedByGameID
      Games are mapped by game id for easier access to friend game data when combining data from multiple api calls and database.
      private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Friend> friendList
      UI friend list is formed from the data in this list.
      private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<GameData> friendsGames
      UI friend game info (detail/comparison is formed from the data in this list.

        public void setSavedSelections(java.util.List<GameListEntry> dbEntries)

      • loadGameSchema

        public void loadGameSchema(int appID)
        Loads the game schema (achievements belonging to game etc.) from SteamAPI. Game info is added to previously retrieved game data.
        Parameters:
        appID -

      • getAchievementCompletionInfo

        private void getAchievementCompletionInfo(int appID)
        Loads the achievement completion info (completion and timestamp) for a game defined by appID from SteamAPI. Info is added to previously retrieved game data.

        appID -
